thread.title: "Ol' Man River" Live From Lincoln Center
thread.title_full: Video: "Ol' Man River" | Watch Live From Lincoln Center Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: "Ol' Man River" Live From Lincoln Center
text: Norm Lewis, who plays "Joe" in this lively production, and Rodgers & Hammerstein president Ted Chapin offer historical context for what makes "Ol' Man River" one of America's musical milestones.
